wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Richards (born 1954) is a British competitive sailor and Olympic medalist. He won a bronze medal in the Flying Dutchman class at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, together with Peter Allam.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1984 Summer Olympics
response: * Peter Allam and Jonathan Richards — Sailing, Men's Flying Dutchman

Peter Frank Allam (born 25 July 1959) is a British competitive sailor and Olympic medalist. He won a bronze medal in the Flying Dutchman class at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, together with Jonathan Richards.
